source: Strictly Lindy Hop Swing Vancouver, BC | Facebook
description: Our goal in creating this day of casual and affordable workshops is to open up space for learning and developing for all social dancers, whether you have the motivation, time, money, and or interest to attend weekly classes or not. Come explore dance skills in a friendly space, and then social dance in the evening! Lindsay's Solo Jazz class description: Solo Jazz for experienced dancers – Musicality & Footwork. In this solo jazz class, we'll explore how melody can lead the way—using it as our map to move through familiar jazz steps. Expect to challenge your movement vocab and strengthen your brain-body connection with individual and small group exercises. We’ll wrap it up with a short choreo that ties together everything you'll learn. Come ready to groove!
